Title: Enacts the carbon dioxide removal leadership act; repealer
Summary: Enacts the carbon dioxide removal leadership act which directs New York state to procure carbon dioxide removal services in order to achieve statewide net zero greenhouse gas emissions pursuant to legally enforceable limits; defines terms.
LawCode: Add Art 76 §§76-0101 - 76-0117, En Con L; rpld §301-e sub (f), §1115 sub (a) ¶9, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to enacting the carbon dioxide removal leadership act; and to repeal certain provisions of the tax law relating to taxes on carbon dioxide emissions
